Bringing climate change to the forefront of American politics

for NextGen Climate

Role
Project Lead, Creative Direction, Design
Team
Cottleston Pie, Patronage
Live Site
nextgenclimate.org

NextGen is making a push to become thevoice for climate change and using digital media to do just that. Cottleston Pie was brought on to redesign the homepage to focus on the stories being told. We were able to use some amazing photography to tell the stories of Americans who are being affected by climate change and motivate users to take action.

Cottleston Pie is run by Dave Dawson with help from friends
